DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose of this protocol is to investigate the safety and tolerability of AZD8330 (ARRY-424704) in patients with Advanced Malignancies
DOC.brief_title: AZD8330 First Time in Man in Patients With Advanced Malignancies
DOC.criteria: Cancer which is refractory to standard therapies, or no therapies exist; Participated in radiotherapy, biological or chemotherapy within 21 days prior to study start; Hasn't participated in investigation drug study within 30 days; Brain metastases/spinal cord compression unless treated and stable, Off steroids/anticonvulsants.
